Method Detail

getChallengeText

public final String getChallengeText()
Description copied from interface: Challenge
Get the text of the Challenge question. Depending on the origin and type of the challenge, the value may be null.

Specified by:
getChallengeText in interface Challenge
Returns:
A string containing the challenge text (question), or null if not available

setChallengeText

public void setChallengeText(String challengeText)
Description copied from interface: Challenge
Set the challenge text. Challenge text is only modifiable if the challenge is not locked, and if is not admin defiled (Challenge.isAdminDefined()).

Specified by:
setChallengeText in interface Challenge
Parameters:
challengeText - A valid challenge text string.

public final boolean isAdminDefined()
Description copied from interface: Challenge
Get a boolean indicating if the question is defined by the administrator or by the user.

Specified by:
isAdminDefined in interface Challenge
Returns:
true if the question is defined by the administrator, false if defined by the user.

isLocked

public boolean isLocked()
Description copied from interface: Challenge
Check if the Challege is locked. Once locked, a Challenge is immutable.

Specified by:
isLocked in interface Challenge
Returns:
true if locked.

isRequired

public final boolean isRequired()
Description copied from interface: Challenge
Indicates if this Challenge is one which is required, or if it is one of the random questions.

Specified by:
isRequired in interface Challenge
Returns:
true if the question is required, false if random.

equals

public boolean equals(Object o)
Tests for equality of Challenges. Challenges are equal when the following elements of a challenge are equal:
  • admin defined
  • maximum length
  • minimum length
  • required
  • challenge text if admin defined is true
Specifically, the response text is not used to test equality.

Overrides:
equals in class Object
Parameters:
o - another Challenge object
Returns:
true if the objects are the same.
